A helper that runs multi-seeded experiments and records data.

pandemic_simulator.script_helpers.setup_sim_env module¶

pandemic_simulator.script_helpers.setup_sim_env.make_gym_env(sim_opts: pandemic_simulator.environment.simulator_opts.PandemicSimOpts, sim_non_cli_opts: pandemic_simulator.environment.simulator_opts.PandemicSimNonCLIOpts, pandemic_regulations: Optional[List[pandemic_simulator.environment.interfaces.regulation.PandemicRegulation]] = None, city_registry: Optional[pandemic_simulator.environment.city_registry.CityRegistry] = None, done_fn: Optional[pandemic_simulator.environment.done.DoneFunction] = None, numpy_rng: Optional[numpy.random.mtrand.RandomState] = None) → pandemic_simulator.environment.pandemic_env.PandemicGymEnv[source]¶

A helper that sets up pandemic_simulator gym env

Parameters

  • sim_opts – Simulator options (that can be potentially passed as command line args)

  • sim_non_cli_opts – Simulator options that cannot be passed as command line args

  • pandemic_regulations – A list of pandemic regulations to use. If None, austin_regulations are used.

  • city_registry – optional city registry (if None, one is created and used)

  • done_fn – optional done fns for the env

  • numpy_rng – rng

Returns

PandemicGymEnv instance

pandemic_simulator.script_helpers.setup_sim_env.make_sim(sim_opts: pandemic_simulator.environment.simulator_opts.PandemicSimOpts, sim_non_cli_opts: pandemic_simulator.environment.simulator_opts.PandemicSimNonCLIOpts, city_registry: Optional[pandemic_simulator.environment.city_registry.CityRegistry] = None, numpy_rng: Optional[numpy.random.mtrand.RandomState] = None) → pandemic_simulator.environment.pandemic_sim.PandemicSim[source]¶

A helper that sets up pandemic_simulator simulator

Parameters

  • sim_opts – Simulator options (that can be potentially passed as command line args)

  • sim_non_cli_opts – Simulator options that cannot be passed as command line args

  • city_registry – optional city registry (if None, one is created and used)

  • numpy_rng – rng

Returns

PandemicSim instance
